meanings.definition: A form of entertainment in which amateur singers perform along with recorded music.
meanings.sent1: At the party, we had a karaoke session where everyone sang their favorite songs.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys going to karaoke bars on weekends to sing her heart out.
meanings.sent3: The karaoke machine broke down, so we had to sing acapella instead.
meanings.sent4: His life felt like a karaoke performance, with each day bringing a new song to sing.
meanings.sent5: The karaoke night was a hit, with people cheering and clapping after each performance.

meanings.definition: The act of singing along to a music track without the original vocals.
meanings.sent1: During the road trip, they entertained themselves by doing karaoke in the car.
meanings.sent2: She practiced her karaoke skills by singing along to her favorite songs at home.
meanings.sent3: The cat joined in the karaoke session by meowing along to the music.
meanings.sent4: Her voice blended perfectly with the karaoke track, creating a harmonious melody.
meanings.sent5: The karaoke competition brought out the hidden talents of many participants.
